node.title: 'Selfless' football legend Russell Ebert farewelled at state funeral
node.description: Australian football legend Russell Ebert has been remembered as a man whose achievements and personal qualities "extended far beyond the football field", with hundreds attendingÂ a state funeral in Port Adelaide Magpies heartland.
node.content:
["Australian football legend Russell Ebert has been remembered by family as a man whose achievements and personal qualities \"extended far beyond the football field\".", "More than 4,000 people gathered at\u00a0Alberton Oval \u2014 home of the Port Adelaide Magpies \u2014 for a state funeral to pay tribute to the SANFL luminary.", "Ebert died earlier this month\u00a0at the age of 72\u00a0after a battle with leukaemia.", "The former Port Adelaide captain played a club record 392 games between 1968 and 1985, won three premierships and is the only player in the history of the sport\u00a0to have been\u00a0awarded four Magarey Medals.", "He also joined North Melbourne for a season in the VFL in 1979.", "His son Brett \u2014 who followed in his father's footsteps by winning the 2003 Magarey Medal, and enjoyed a distinguished career with Port Adelaide's AFL side \u2014 described his father as a \"selfless\" and \"compassionate\" man.", "\"Never did Dad's words contradict his actions, nor his actions contradict his words \u2014 selfless, resilient, compassionate, honest.\"", "", "
More than 4,000 mourners\u00a0gathered at Alberton.(ABC News: Steve Opie)
", "Ebert won six best and fairest awards at Port Adelaide and\u00a0was inducted into both the SANFL and Australian football halls\u00a0of fame.\u00a0", "Just last month, he was elevated to \"legend\" status in the South Australian Sport Hall of Fame.", "He was involved in Port Adelaide community programs\u00a0for decades after his on-field retirement.", "", "
Barrie Robran and Bruce McAvaney visit\u00a0Russell Ebert at home to let him know he had been made a legend in the South Australian Sport Hall of Fame.(Supplied: Jordan Bianchini PAFC\u00a0)
", "His daughter Tammy Kernich said her father's footballing achievements were just one part of a full life.", "\"We've had a chance to reflect on just how good he was,\" Dr Kernich said.", "\"To us, though, he was Dad, not Russell Ebert.", "", "
Russell Ebert won four premierships with the Magpies.(Port Adelaide Football Club)
", "Port Adelaide Football Club chaplain Brandon Chaplin said Ebert\u00a0\"used his footballing fame to help others\".", "", "
Tributes have been paid to the Port Adelaide legend in front of packed stands.(ABC News: Camron Slessor)
"]
